responses: A DoS (Denial of Service) attack aims to make a machine or network resource unavailable by overwhelming it with traffic.
SQL Injection is a code injection technique used to attack data-driven applications by inserting malicious SQL statements into input fields.
Phishing is a type of cyberattack where attackers impersonate legitimate institutions via email or messages to steal sensitive data.
Malware refers to malicious software like viruses, worms, spyware, ransomware used to harm or exploit systems.
